experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: â€¢ Identified key metrics and analyzed cloud data of 20,000+ customer scooters for baselining existing range estimation accuracy.â€¢ Interacted with over 40 daily active users to better understand the actual user experience around the instances of range drop issues.â€¢ Analysed NMC cell behaviour to develop a hypothesis for the root cause of range drop issues based on customer data and user feedback.â€¢ Defined test cases and ran experiments on 40 test scooters for validating the root cause hypothesis based on the test data collected.â€¢ Backtested the proposed heuristic range estimation model using test data yielding an estimation accuracy improvement of 6.5%.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Identified key metrics and analyzed cloud data of 20,000+ customer scooters for baselining existing range estimation accuracy.â€¢ Interacted with over 40 daily active users to better understand the actual user experience around the instances of range drop issues.â€¢ Analysed NMC cell behaviour to develop a hypothesis for the root cause of range drop issues based on customer data and user feedback.â€¢ Defined test cases and ran experiments on 40 test scooters for validating the root cause hypothesis based on the test data collected.â€¢ Backtested the proposed heuristic range estimation model using test data yielding an estimation accuracy improvement of 6.5%.

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: â€¢ Independently shipped major student pod modules like day-over-day progress card and Lido community dashboardâ€¢ Devised productized solutions and operational improvements increasing the new user reward redemption KPI by 22% in 3 monthsâ€¢ Facilitated the addressal of escalations from customer success team concerning the students by providing required product solutionsâ€¢ Jointly prepared the student product walkthrough document covering details of all features and functionalities of the student productâ€¢ Performed in-depth pre-release QA and user acceptance testing of major modules on both staging as well as production environment.

experience.title: Financial Risk Analyst Intern
experience.description: â€¢ Carried out extensive research on Financial Risk Profiling methods and identified best practices for building a risk tolerance questionnaireâ€¢ Devised a response validation framework using a correlational mapping between user responses to ensure internal consistencyâ€¢ Developed a risk tolerance questionnaire and checked its validity and reliability based on International Psychometric Standardsâ€¢ Built a machine learning model using KNN Algorithm (K Nearest Neighbour) for the classification of the client's Financial Risk Tolerance
